content: The XYZ Immunoassay System is an advanced diagnostic analyzer that employs antibodies or antigens to measure the concentration of a molecule in various test cartridges for diagnostic purposes. The system can perform quantitative, semi-quantitative, and qualitative measurements using multiple detection methods, such as enzymes, radioactive isotopes, DNA probes, fluorescence, and electrochemiluminescence. This system is designed to ensure accuracy, precision, and consistency in results, thereby providing clinicians with reliable diagnostic information. The device also offers various test modes, including read now and walk away modes, making it flexible to meet different diagnostic needs. Its robust MicroWell, Intellicheck, and MicroSensor immunodiagnostic technologies enable it to deliver uninterrupted workflow while maintaining a high level of accuracy. It is also eco-friendly, making it easy to use and dispose of the reagents, consumables, and waste. Additionally, this system is standardized with other XYZ systems, facilitating seamless integration into existing laboratory workflows.
